result.reason: Searching session output is a highly requested feature but difficult due to the current architecture of reparenting external windows (PuTTY, RDP); requires investigating a native terminal control or log-parsing approach.
result.approach: Investigate feasibility of parsing active session logs or replacing the PuTTY wrapper with a native .NET SSH terminal control to enable text buffer search.
